thread.title: Happy Customer
thread.title_full: Prudent Financial Services reviewed by Happy Customer

author: Happy Customer
title: Happy Customer
text: The staff are very friendly and pleasant when answering the phone, and my questions. And thank you especially to Farrukh Mushtaq, who has been a great source of help. Keep up the great job Prudent. I will recommend you anyone who's looking for your type of service!!
